scripts.deploy: anchor deploy -p magic-roulette --provider.cluster d --program-keypair target/deploy/magic_roulette-keypair.json --provider.wallet magic-roulette-wallet.json
scripts.idl:init: anchor idl init $(anchor keys list | grep 'magic_roulette:' | awk '{print $2}') -f target/idl/magic_roulette.json --provider.cluster d --provider.wallet magic-roulette-wallet.json
scripts.idl:upgrade: anchor idl upgrade $(anchor keys list | grep 'magic_roulette:' | awk '{print $2}') -f target/idl/magic_roulette.json --provider.cluster d --provider.wallet magic-roulette-wallet.json
scripts.idl:sync: cp target/idl/magic_roulette.json app/src/idl/magic-roulette.json; cp target/types/magic_roulette.ts app/src/types/magic-roulette.ts
scripts.reset: solana program close $(solana address -k target/deploy/magic_roulette-keypair.json) -u d --authority magic-roulette-wallet.json --recipient magic-roulette-wallet.json --bypass-warning; solana-keygen new -o target/deploy/magic_roulette-keypair.json -f --no-bip39-passphrase; anchor keys sync; anchor build; bun run deploy
